newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cornerstone Realty started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cornerstone Realty started.

text.p: -- Alex. Brown said it started coverage of Cornerstone Realty Income Trust Inc with a strong buy rating.
-- Cornerstone reported on Friday that its first quarter funds from operations rose to $0.26 per share from $0.25 last year. The company launched an initial public offering last week.
